sentences.english: Yeah, I'll take it under advisement.
The circle seemed to portray the deliberations of the young man.
sentences.chinese: 绕圈子似乎在描绘年轻人的深思熟虑。

sentences.english: In this process, the consumer deliberates within himself before he finally makes a purchase move.
sentences.chinese: 在这个过程中，消费者在最终采购前经过了深思熟虑。

sentences.english: All are the sort of well-meaning and thoughtful films that the Academy likes best.
sentences.chinese: 全部是组委会最喜欢的那种善意的深思熟虑的电影。

sentences.english: Yours is a prudent, well-considered audacity.
sentences.chinese: 而是经过慎重的深思熟虑。

sentences.english: You say it's a carefully thought-out plan. I cannot, however, approve of if.
sentences.chinese: 你说此方案经过深思熟虑，然而我无法赞同。

sentences.english: Will is nothing but the last appetite or aversion remaining in deliberation.
sentences.chinese: 意志无非是深思熟虑中最后余留的欲求或厌恶。

sentences.english: It will help to have a clearly thought-out process for resolving conflicts.
sentences.chinese: 用一种深思熟虑得出的方案来解决冲突大有帮助。

sentences.english: Democracy requires debate and deliberation as well as voting.
sentences.chinese: 民主要求辩论和经过深思熟虑的投票。

sentences.english: 'But it's a complicated market that requires significant discipline and thoughtfulness.'
sentences.chinese: 但中国市场情况复杂，需要纪律严明与深思熟虑。

sentences.english: This will be a reflective year for you, Horse.
sentences.chinese: 这一年对于属马的朋友来说是深思熟虑的一年。

sentences.english: The choice of a university as the venue for this speech was deliberate.
sentences.chinese: 选择一所大学作为此次演讲的地点是经过深思熟虑的。

sentences.english: So Hung Fu has contributed to waking the Cavell Lighting leader in its field always taking needs and requirements of its qualified Customers into account.
sentences.chinese: 为了满足顾客的要求和需要，他们总是在深思熟虑中。

sentences.english: She had not planned to get pregnant and had deliberated hard about going ahead as a single parent.
sentences.chinese: 她不打算怀孕，且就做一个单亲也经过一番深思熟虑。

definition: to think sth through/to consider carefully
to reckon/to consider/to turn over in one's mind
to consider/to deliberate/to fill up a cup to the brim
to consider past cause and future effect (idiom); to think over the past and future/to ponder over reasons and connection
think again and again before acting (idiom); consider carefully in advance
think three times then go (idiom); don't act before you've thought it through carefully
lit. deep plans and distant thoughts/to plan far ahead (idiom)
to turn things over in one's mind/to conjecture/to guess
to observe and form a judgment
